ValidationRule.description: Enter new Account information if an Existing Account is not selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(( Account__c ='' && ( RecordTypeId !=$Label.BGA_Honeywell_Prospect) ) && ( $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User RO Automation' && not contains($Profile.Name, 'Admin') ) && ( Account_Phone__c = '' || Account_Address_line_1__c = '' || Account_City__c = '' || ISPICKVAL( Account_Country__c ,'') ), true,false)
